config.title: Profits for Company G

response.prompt: Select the option that orders the months from highest to lowest profit.
options: Jan, Apr, May, Sep, Feb, Jun, Dec, Jul, Aug, Mar, Nov, Oct
Feb, Jan, Apr, Mar, May, Jul, Aug, Jun, Nov, Sep, Oct, Dec
Aug, Apr, Jun, Feb, Oct, Dec, May, Nov, Jan, Jul, Mar, Sep
Dec, Oct, Sep, Nov, Jun, Aug, Jul, May, Mar, Apr, Jan, Feb

correctAnswer.answer: Feb, Jan, Apr, Mar, May, Jul, Aug, Jun, Nov, Sep, Oct, Dec

config.title: Profits for Company G

response.prompt: Select the option that orders the months from highest to lowest profit.
options: Jan, Apr, May, Sep, Feb, Jun, Dec, Jul, Aug, Mar, Nov, Oct

Aug, Apr, Jun, Feb, Oct, Dec, May, Nov, Jan, Jul, Mar, Sep
Dec, Oct, Sep, Nov, Jun, Aug, Jul, May, Mar, Apr, Jan, Feb

correctAnswer.answer: Feb, Jan, Apr, Mar, May, Jul, Aug, Jun, Nov, Sep, Oct, Dec
